column4: I have an old machine running 7.10 and I would like to update it to 8.04, being the next version and an LTS version.  What is the easiest way of doing this?  As 7.10 is unsupported, apt-get upgrade isn't working.
Thanks.  Will that just take me to 8.04 or will it try to bring it up to 9.10?
you can do this gksudo update-manager -d
